name: Winter Ritual
description:
My entry for the 2015 AGDG Winter Jam.

When looking at the ground, click Left Mouse Button to pick up a snowball. While holding the snowball, hold and release Left Mouse Button to throw it. Press Escape to quit.

Press 1 to lower mouse sensitivity.

Press 2 to raise mouse sensitivity.

I wanted to do something a bit different than this, but what I was trying wasn't working, and because of that there isn't much to this thing.

-Updated with lower default mouse sensitivity and the ability to adjust sensitivity (look at controls above)
